ninja.bytecode.shuriken.bukkit.api.world

Class RayTrace

  • java.lang.Object
    • ninja.bytecode.shuriken.bukkit.api.world.RayTrace

  • public class RayTrace
extends java.lang.Object
    Ray Tracing! Start at a location and override the trace function to manually raytrace.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RayTrace(org.bukkit.Location start, org.bukkit.util.Vector direction, java.lang.Double maxDistance, java.lang.Double step)
      Create a RayTrace instance to be fired with trace() and overridden with onTrace(Location l)

    • Constructor Detail

      • RayTrace

        public RayTrace(org.bukkit.Location start,
                org.bukkit.util.Vector direction,
                java.lang.Double maxDistance,
                java.lang.Double step)
        Create a RayTrace instance to be fired with trace() and overridden with onTrace(Location l)
        Parameters:
        start - the starting location for this trace
        direction - the direction this trace should go
        maxDistance - the max distance this trace can cover
        step - the step. 1 for normal. 0.5 for twice as many hits, 2 for half as many.

    • Method Detail

      • trace

        public void trace()
        Begins the raytrace operation and calls onTrace(Location l) each step

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the raytrace. You can only call this while it is running inside of the onTrace(Location l) method

      • onTrace

        public void onTrace(org.bukkit.Location location)
        Called each iteration in the raytrace
        Parameters:
        location - the location hit
